Name : Mathieu Villegas

Email : mimetype&immervision.com
MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.immervision-ivp

Required parameters :

Optional parameters :


Encoding considerations : binary
This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of
handling binary.

Security considerations :The file may contain prorietary
scripting language interpreted by the application used to
display this media (the ImmerVision PURE Player). The
langage specification do not support any function
allowing direct access to the host operationg system,
other applications, external data or file system.
information contained in the media type doesn't need
privacy or integrity services.

Interoperability considerations :


Published specification :
It is not an opened specification and no published document is
available. ImmerVision Canada Inc control the specification.

Applications which use this media :
ImmerVision PURE Players.
http://www.immervision.com/en/multimedia/multimedia_products.php

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : none
2. File extension(s) : ivp
3. Macintosh file type code : none
4. Object Identifiers: none



Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Mathieu Villegas
2. Email : mimetype&immervision.com

Intended usage : Common
